rukus.text: 78|1|sihamte ki bisaye parasparae sodha-poca karai ache
78|2|mahasambadatora bisaye
78|3|yi bisaye sihamte matanaikya karaiche.
78|4|Ketiya'o nahaya, sihamte atisighrae'i janibalai paba.
78|5|Tarapichata, ketiya'o nahaya, sihamte atisighrae'i janibalai paba.
78|6|Ami prthiraikhanaka sayya banoraa na'ine
78|7|arau parbatasamuhaka peraeka
78|8|arau ami tomalokaka srsti karaicho yoraa-yoraa.
78|9|Arau tomalokara topanika karaicho bisraama.
78|10|Arau raatika karai dicho ararana.
78|11|Arau dinaka karai dicho jiraika uparjanara samaya.
78|12|Arau ami tomalokara oparata nirmana karaicho sudrrha satakhana akasa.
78|13|Arau ami srsti karaicho eti ujjala pradipa.
78|14|Arau ami barsana karaicho meghamalara paraa pracura pani.
78|15|Yate tara dbaraa ami utpanna karaiba parao sasya arau udbhida.
78|16|Arau ghana sannibista udyana.
78|17|Niscaya nirdharaita ache bicarara dina.
78|18|Se'i dina sinata phum diya ha’ba tetiya tomaloke dale dale ahiba.
78|19|Arau akasakhana khuli diya ha’ba, phalata i ha’ba bahu duraarabisista.
78|20|Arau parbatasamuhaka calita karaa ha’ba, phalata se'ibora hai yaba balimaya maraicikara darae.
78|21|Niscaya jahannama khapa pati raai ache.
78|22|Simalanghanakarai sakalara babe pratyarartanasthala.
78|23|Tata sihamte yuga yuga dharai arasthana karaiba.
78|24|Tata sihamte sitalata ba upayukta pani'o bhoga karaiba noraaraiba.
78|25|Utala pani arau durgandhamaya pumjara bahirae.
78|26|E'itorae'i upayukta pratiphala.
78|27|Niscaya sihamte ketiya'o hicaba-nikacara asa karaa nachila.
78|28|Arau sihamte amara nidarsanaralika kathorabharae mithyaraopa karaichila.
78|29|Arau ami pratito bastu likhitabharae samraksana karai raakhicho.
78|30|Eteke bhoga karaa, ami tomalokara babe sastira bahirae ana eko brd'dhi nakarao.
